properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 10:48AM CST until January 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam...and Cairo

.Minor flooding continues along portions of the lower Ohio River and
river levels are forecast to remain nearly steady over the next several
days, before falling early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam.
* until Wednesday morning.
* At 10:00 AM Thursday the stage was 39.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 36.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will hold nearly steady around 39.4 feet
through Saturday morning, before levels start to fall. The river
is forecast to fall below flood stage next Wednesday.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
